titleStmt.title: Fragments of Laches from a roll containing Charmides

encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Submit - corrected lunate sigma in fr.1 lin14.
Commit - corrected lunate sigma in fr.1 lin14.
Finalized - This is good to go.
Finalized - This is good to go.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Text: stop in 1.4 is *high-punctus*; correct faulty word wrap throughout; 1.10 is lost.1lin; dot final omicron in 1.15; dot sigma in 1.18; in 1.23 I prefer lost.?lin with introductory comment indicating that approximately 10 lines are lost between the two fragments, probably (but not certainly) from the same column; add [.?] to start of 2.1; check spacing in 2.8-2.10. Meta: check biblio for deprecated units; add passage data (179c-d and 180a-b); Plato is CWBK 1050 and Laches is 3599; mp3 is 01407.410; Oxyrhynchus is Pleiades (https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/736983),

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Text: stop in 1.4 is *high-punctus*; correct faulty word wrap throughout; 1.10 is lost.1lin; dot final omicron in 1.15; dot sigma in 1.18; in 1.23 I prefer lost.?lin with introductory comment indicating that approximately 10 lines are lost between the two fragments, probably (but not certainly) from the same column; add [.?] to start of 2.1; check spacing in 2.8-2.10. Meta: check biblio for deprecated units; add passage data (179c-d and 180a-b); Plato is CWBK 1050 and Laches is 3599; mp3 is 01407.410; Oxyrhynchus is Pleiades (https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/736983),
Submit - Originally submitted to litpap.info 2017.03.08 by Julia Lougovaya. Submission has been transferred to papyri.info. Submission notes were: "Entered after the edition."
